title: Emerald Blossom Jhumkaalu: A Touch of Royalty
materials: meticulously studded with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones mimicking Diamonds. Features a central Emerald-colored gemstone
features: Classic Jhumka silhouette with intricate filigree work and micro-pave setting of CZ stones. Features a floral-shaped top section with a central Emerald stone. The dome of the Jhumka showcases delicate cut-out patterns and is adorned with cascading pearl drops adding a touch of elegance and tradition. This is finished with a Hyderabad gold polish for added sheen and resilience.
colors: Predominantly Gold and White (CZ) with a striking Emerald Green center stone and creamy white pearl drops.
occasions: or Dussehra. Also suitable for special occasions such as Seemantham (baby shower) or any festive event where a touch of traditional elegance is desired. Perfect for bridal wear or as a statement piece for formal gatherings.
description: This pair of Jhumkaalu embodies timeless South Indian elegance. The Emerald center stone adds a regal touch, while the intricate filigree work and micro-pave CZ setting demonstrate exceptional craftsmanship. The combination of traditional design with modern gemstone setting makes this piece versatile and appealing to a wide range of customers. These are durable and will remain beautiful for years to come.
